message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer.  That price is a little high for me. Would you consider $60?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I can do a bit better than that. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate you working with me Alice.  How about $75?
I can see you're serious about getting a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $75 and $82.50, so how about $78.75?
